languages.text: "Путь истинного служения есть путь потерь. Пусть события на Фтоне не ослабят твою решимость, Вени'Хенрикс".

traits.locale_text: "Путь истинного служения есть путь потерь. Пусть события на Фтоне не ослабят твою решимость, Вени'Хенрикс".

languages.text: "The thread of true service is one of loss. May the events of Phton IV not weaken your resolve, Veni'Heinrix."
languages.original_text: "Путь истинного служения есть путь потерь. Пусть события на Фтоне не ослабят твою решимость, Вени'Хенрикс".

traits.locale_text: "The thread of true service is one of loss. May the events on Phton not weaken your resolve, Veni'Heinrix."
"The thread of true service is one of loss. May the events on Phton not weaken your resolve, Veni'Heinrix."
"The thread of true service is one of loss. May the events on Phton not weaken your resolve, Veni'Heinrix."
"The thread of true service is one of loss. May the events on Phton IV not weaken your resolve, Veni'Heinrix."
"The thread of true service is one of loss. May the events of Phton IV not weaken your resolve, Veni'Heinrix."
"The thread of true service is one of loss. May the events of Phton IV not weaken your resolve, Veni'Heinrix."

languages.text: «El hilo del auténtico servicio está cargado de pérdidas. Espero que los sucesos de Phton IV no mermen su determinación, Veni'Heinrix».
languages.original_text: "The thread of true service is one of loss. May the events of Phton IV not weaken your resolve, Veni'Heinrix."

languages.text: 「真なる法師の糸は、喪失の糸である。ハインリックスさん、プトン・IVでの出来事が、あなたの決意を弱めませんように」
languages.original_text: "The thread of true service is one of loss. May the events of Phton IV not weaken your resolve, Veni'Heinrix."

languages.text: “侍奉真正的意义在于失去。希望菲顿四号星上发生的事情不会削弱你的决心，帷者海因里希。”
languages.original_text: "The thread of true service is one of loss. May the events of Phton IV not weaken your resolve, Veni'Heinrix."

languages.text: "Der Faden des wahren Dienstes ist mit Verlust verbunden. Mögen die Ereignisse auf Phton IV Eure Entschlossenheit nicht mindern, Veni'Heinrix."
languages.original_text: "The thread of true service is one of loss. May the events of Phton IV not weaken your resolve, Veni'Heinrix."

languages.text: « Le fil du service véritable mène inévitablement au deuil. J'espère que les événements de Phton-IV n'affaibliront pas votre détermination, Veni'Heinrix. »
languages.original_text: "The thread of true service is one of loss. May the events of Phton IV not weaken your resolve, Veni'Heinrix."
"The thread of true service is one of loss. May the events on Phton IV not weaken your resolve, Veni'Heinrix."

languages.text: "Hakiki hizmetin ipliği kaybetmekten geçer. Phton IV'te yaşanan olaylar, seni kararlılığından yoksun kılmasın Veni'Heinrix."
languages.original_text: "The thread of true service is one of loss. May the events of Phton IV not weaken your resolve, Veni'Heinrix."
